flawed_nl_solution:
The third dig site was dated from the year 8400 / 2 = <<8400/2=4020.0>>4020.0 BC.
Thus, the first dig site was dated from the year 4020.0 - 3700 = <<4020.0-3700=320.0>>320.0 BC.
The second dig site was 352 years older, so it was dated from the year 320.0 + 352 = <<320.0+352=672.0>>672.0 BC.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4200.0, not 4020.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
